ComicInfo.Summary: The Crimson Nun Returns! When father Odysseus Clifton, partner of the legendary Crimson Nun, shows up at St. Thomas' Church, Areala learns that an antediluvian evil threatens the safety of the world once again. Father Clifton entrusts the origin of the most egnimatic Warrior Nun to Areala and reveals how she fought to protect the world from this ancient evil's influence. The year is 1938, and the Crimson Nun is called into action to stop her nemesis, Colonel Mordecai Black, from locating the earthly prison of the fallen angel Azazel. The situation becomes more urgent still when she learns that mysterious forces are behind his attempts to find the imprisoned seraph.
ComicInfo.Tags: Adolf Hitler,Father Black,Captain Yoma,Warrior Nun Areala,Azazel,Crimson Nun
